item.description: I am currently a Visiting Research Scholar in [Visual Intelligence Lab]() at [Georgia Tech]() working with Prof. Devi Parikh and Prof. Dhruv Batra. I graduated with an MS in Computer Science and Statistics from Purdue University where I was advised by Prof. Xiao Wang. Prior to that, I was an undergrad at IIT Kharagpur where I recieved B.Tech + M.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering. I was advised by Prof. Partha Pratim Chakrabarti for my B.
